physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: well appearing man, no acute distress; HEENT: PERRL, EOMI, oropharynx is clear with moist mucous membranes; CV: r/r/r, no murmurs; Resp: CTA bilaterally without crackles or wheezing; Abd: soft, mildly tender around laparoscopic incisions, slightly distended, no guarding; Incisions: CD&I without signs of infection; Ext: wwp, no edema; Neuro: alert and oriented, CN II-XII intact, moving all extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient reports that his pain is now a 5 and improved, but he can feel it returning.
